doc.name: MovieReader
doc.description:
This actor loads a video file (MPEG, AVI, or Quicktime files only), and outputs each frame as a JMFImageToken.

Note that not all formats are supported, for details, see the JMF faq at: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/faq-jmf-137005.html#jmf2-support.
doc.author: James Yeh
doc.property: The file name or URL from which to read. This is a string with any form accepted by File Attribute. The default value is the string "file:///C:/program%20files/quicktime/Sample.mov".
